content:
### Scene
Mirror selfie in an otaku-style computer corner, blue color tone.

### Subject
* Gender expression: female
* Age: around 25
* Ethnicity: East Asian
* Body type: slim, with a defined waist; natural body proportions
* Skin tone: light neutral tone
* Hairstyle:
    * Length: waist-length hair
    * Style: straight with slightly curled ends
    * Color: medium brown
* Pose:
    * Stance: standing in a slight contrapposto pose
    * Right hand: holding a smartphone in front of her face (identity hidden)
    * Left arm: naturally hanging down alongside the torso
    * Torso: body leaning slightly back; waist and abdomen exposed
* Clothing:
    * Top: light blue cropped knit cardigan, top two buttons fastened; a blue French-style bra faintly visible
    * Bottom: denim ultra-short shorts, with a blue satin ribbon bow on each side of the hips
    * Socks: blue and white horizontal striped over-the-knee socks
    * Accessory: a blue cute mascot phone case

### Environment
* Description: bedroom computer corner seen through a wall-mounted mirror
* Furnishings:
    * White desk
    * Single monitor showing a soft blue wallpaper (no readable text)
    * Mechanical keyboard with white keycaps on a blue desk mat
    * Mouse on a small blue mouse pad
    * PC tower on the right side with blue case lighting
    * Three anime figures on or near the PC tower
    * A poster of a pagoda on the wall
    * Cat-shaped desk lamp with blue accents
    * A transparent glass of water
    * A tall green leafy plant by the window (on the left side of the frame)
* Color replacement: replace all originally pink elements (clothes and room decor) with blue tones (baby blue to sky blue/periwinkle blue).

### Lighting
* Light source: daylight coming from a large window on the left side of the camera, through sheer curtains
* Light quality: soft, diffused light
* White balance (K): 5200

### Camera
* Mode: smartphone rear camera shooting via the mirror (no portrait/bokeh mode)
* Equivalent focal length (mm): 26
* Distances (m):
    * Subject to mirror: 0.6
    * Camera to mirror: 0.5
* Exposure:
    * Aperture (f): 1.8
    * ISO: 100
    * Shutter speed (s): 0.01
    * Exposure compensation (EV): -0.3
* Focus: focus on the torso and shorts in the mirror image
* Depth of field: natural smartphone deep depth of field; background clearly visible with no artificial blur
* Composition:
    * Aspect ratio: 1:1
    * Crop: from the top of the head to mid-thigh; include the desk, monitor, PC tower, and plant in the frame
    * Angle: slightly high angle from the mirror’s point of view
    * Composition note: keep the subject centered; to avoid wide-angle edge distortion, have her stand a bit further away and crop to a square later.

### Negative prompts
* Any appearance of pink/magenta anywhere
* Beauty filters/over-smoothed skin; poreless skin look
* Exaggerated or distorted anatomy
* NSFW, see-through fabrics, wardrobe malfunctions
* Logos, brand names, or readable user interface text
* Fake portrait-mode blur, CGI/illustration feel

Do not alter the face at all

Maintain the exact proportions of features, face shape, eye size, nose, mouth, and jawline

Do not change the gender of the person in the input photo

Do not generate new people (opposite/same sex)

Hairstyle:

Maintain the original hairstyle

Do not change the length, parting, or curl

content: Create a 4:5 hyper-realistic 4K mirror-selfie image of a young adult woman kneeling on a light wood floor in a luxury walk-in closet. She wears a fitted black spaghetti-strap mini dress with a square neckline, short hem, and sleek silhouette. Her brown hair with burgundy front highlights is pulled into a low bun with loose strands framing her face. She makes a playful pout, looking directly at her mirror reflection while holding a smartphone with a tan/beige case in her right hand; a small Polaroid photo of Kung-fu Panda is tucked into the back of the case. Accessories include small gold hoop earrings, a thin silver bracelet on her left wrist, rings on her fingers, and a white polished manicure. A small fluffy dog with a merle coat (brown, tan, white patches) and a red/pink collar stands beside her, facing left in profile. The environment is a bright, tidy dressing room with a large floor-length mirror, open wardrobe shelves with folded clothes, hanging garments, white shelving, and visible Sephora and Mango shopping bags. Bright indoor artificial lighting with soft diffusion, eye-level mirror composition, neutral beige/wood/white palette with high-contrast black subject, sharp focus, photorealistic textures. Keep the face hundred percent the same from the reference picture.

content:
I. Composition
1 Layout: Overall 3:4 ratio, four-panel collage, 3:4 small images arranged in 2x2
2 Framing: Close-up to extreme close-up, subject occupies a large proportion of the screen
3 Angle: Eye-level close-up, slight left/right variation, uniform clean background

II. Main Subject
1 Reference Source: Use uploaded reference image as the strict identity source
2 Consistency Requirement: Zero deviation
3 Face: Delicate face shape, slightly large eyes, a small mole below the right eye, long and thin nose bridge
4 Skin Quality: Fair with light pink undertones, delicate skin, slight soft focus
5 Details: Prominent highlights on the nose bridge and mid-face, slight redness on cheeks and nose tip, scattered light freckles

III. Makeup Details
1 Base Makeup: Transparent and clean, light matte finish with slight sheen
2 Blush: Pink concentrated on the cheeks and sides of the nose bridge
3 Eye Makeup: Naturally enlarged, long lashes, clear eyes
4 Lip Makeup: Hydrated, plump lips, gradient from light pink to peach, soft cupid's bow

IV. Hairstyle and Accessories
1 Hairstyle: Black long straight hair, center part, full volume, naturally draped
2 Flyaways: Small amount of hair naturally floating around the forehead
3 Hair Accessories: One pink hair clip on each side, bright pink and light pink colors, metal clip visible

V. Hands and Accessories
1 Nails: Extra-long shape, translucent or light colors, with fine glitter and 3D decorations
2 Rings: Multiple pink cute-shaped rings, candy and floral aesthetics, exaggerated but soft and cute volume
3 Hand Gesture Style: Near the face and lips, highlighting nail and ring details

VI. Clothing and Material
1 Top: Fuzzy textured jacket or sleeves, white fluffy and soft
2 Inner Wear: Light pink camisole or top, off-shoulder or one-shoulder effect
3 Overall Style: Sweet and soft, with a touch of cool edge

VII. Four Panel Actions and Expressions
1 Top Left: Hands cupping face close to the camera, expression is cold and slightly wronged, looking directly at the camera
2 Top Right: Finger near the lips or lightly touching the lip edge, eyes calm and slightly teasing, closer extreme close-up
3 Bottom Left: Chin or arm resting on the edge of a table, eyes looking sideways, expression is dazed and vacant
4 Bottom Right: Hand clenched lightly against the chin, smiling but restrained, looking directly at the camera, more approachable demeanor

VIII. Lighting and Tone
1 Lighting: High-key soft light, very shallow shadows, uniform overall
2 Color Tone: Predominantly cool white background, pink accents highlighted, skin tone leans cool pink
3 Contrast: Low contrast, clean and transparent, not heavy

IX. Texture and Visual Effect
1 Clarity: Features and hair strands are clear, skin details preserved but with slight blurring/softening
2 Depth of Field: Background blur is very weak or almost textureless, subject is more prominent
3 Atmosphere: Sweet Korean girl group magazine photo style, sweet and cute, delicate and dreamy, slight glass-like sheen.

ATMOSPHERE

content: Use the uploaded reference photo. Low-resolution smartphone close-up selfie taken with a broken front camera screen. The image shows strong natural motion blur concentrated on the woman’s face, hair, and the cat, caused by weak autofocus, slow shutter speed, and slight hand movement while lying down. Blur appears uneven and organic, with soft smearing rather than smooth artificial blur. Facial features are partially obscured but still recognizable, with eyes, nose, and mouth visible as softened shapes. A young woman lies intimately on a cream-colored leather sofa. A light brown cat with bright green eyes is lying on the woman’s chest, pressing its body close and nuzzling its face against the woman’s cheek and jaw, partially covering her face. The cat’s head and the woman’s face overlap closely, creating intimate contact. Both the woman’s face and the cat’s face are noticeably blurred together, with softened edges and slight motion smear from small movements and breathing. The woman’s long brown hair is loose and slightly messy, falling over her forehead and partially blending into the cat’s fur due to blur. Hair strands appear heavily softened but still natural, not melted or warped. The cat’s fur texture is mostly lost, appearing as soft blurred patches consistent with low resolution and motion. Overall sharpness is low, with inconsistent focus across the frame — some tiny areas accidentally a bit clearer while most of the face and the cat remain out of focus. Flat, noisy skin texture with visible ISO noise, chroma noise, mild color banding, and muddy shadows typical of a cheap phone camera. The woman looks toward the lens with a soft, relaxed, intimate expression, though details are softened by blur. She wears simple, light-colored casual clothing, with fabric texture mostly lost. Lighting comes only from indoor room lights at night, slightly too bright, with mild overexposed highlights that do not completely blow out facial structure. Perspective distortion from the front camera wide-angle lens creates subtle stretching near the edges. The composition is very tight, awkward, and unintentional, filling the frame with the woman’s face and the cat’s body and head. The image feels like a raw, accidental selfie straight from the phone gallery — imperfect, intimate, noisy, naturally blurred, completely unedited, with no beautification and no AI enhancement.  NEGATIVE WARNINGS (important): high resolution, sharp focus, DSLR, cinematic lighting, studio lighting, ultra-detail, clean skin texture, beauty filter, HDR, professional photo, sharp edges, smooth look, AI enhancement, overprocessing, perfect blur, depth-of-field bokeh. ar 9:16

A natural, modern indoor mirror-selfie portrait of a young woman inside a stylish contemporary apartment. She has a light-to-medium skin tone with natural texture, soft blush on the cheeks, and minimal makeup—defined brows, lightly enhanced eyes, and natural nude-toned lips. content:
A high-angle selfie perspective captures a young woman with a light skin tone and a subtle tan, sitting on a dark hardwood floor partially covered by a plush white faux fur rug, with one arm extended toward the lens holding the camera. Her legs are bent and tucked to the side. She wears a chunky cream-colored cable-knit sweater dress with a thick, textured knit pattern and an off-the-shoulder neckline that exposes her shoulders and collarbone, finished with long, oversized sleeves. Her long, voluminous blonde hair falls in loose waves with a side part. Her makeup features defined eyebrows, striking winged eyeliner, glossy nude lips, and soft contouring. She holds a soft, alluring gaze, her head tilted slightly to the right.

The setting is a richly cozy, dimly lit living room interior designed for warmth and comfort. Behind her is a substantial, rough-cut natural stone fireplace constructed with professional masonry, its uneven stone surface catching the firelight as bright orange flames burn steadily within. The surrounding space features dark, polished hardwood floors and well-appointed, comfortable furniture with a lived-in, upscale lodge-like feel. In the background, a decorated Christmas tree glows softly, strung with warm white lights that fall into gentle bokeh blur in the distance, adding depth and seasonal atmosphere without distracting from the subject. Christmas presents with colorful wrapping surround the base of the Christmas tree. The overall interior feels intimate, inviting, and quietly luxurious.

Lighting is dominated by a direct on-camera flash, producing crisp highlights on the subject and pronounced shadows cast behind her, while the fireplace provides a secondary warm ambient glow that subtly fills the room. The image aesthetic evokes early-2000s digital camera photography blended with influencer lifestyle imagery, capturing a cozy winter evening mood through a palette of warm neutrals, creamy whites, amber firelight, and deep brown shadows.

A young woman with a sun-kissed, fair complexion where a constellation of freckles is most prominent across the bridge of her nose and cheeks, rendered with Deep Fusion texture accuracy. content:
Add messy red handwritten Japanese comments, expressive doodles, and energetic editorial-style notes directly on top of the image, as if written with a red marker over printed photos. The handwriting should feel spontaneous, unfiltered, emotional, slightly chaotic, and personal—almost like someone’s private photo journal or annotated scrapbook page.

All handwritten text must:
– be in Japanese
– appear hand-drawn, uneven, casual, and overlapping
– be positive in tone

The content of each handwritten note must automatically analyze the uploaded image and praise the woman based on what is visible, such as her outfit, expression, pose, styling, makeup, or mood.
The comments should feel affectionate, admiring, or supportive, and tailored to what stands out in the photo.

Do not repeat generic praise.
Instead, generate unique personal compliments that match the image attributes.

Examples must NOT be shown explicitly in the prompt.
Instead, describe the logic:

“The system should observe the clothing style, face, mood, posture, accessories, or color choices and produce handwritten comments that positively highlight what is visually appealing or admirable about her.”

Also add:
– arrows pointing to notable fashion details
– underlines beneath interesting areas
– circled elements
– crossed-out planning notes like editing marks
– layered cut-and-paste collage scraps (magazine style)
– small torn paper labels
– sticker-like notations
– tape-texture fragments

Overall direction:
Create a visually intense scrapbook-journal composition, filled with affectionate handwriting, red editorial markings, and collage fragments, giving the entire image an emotional and expressive “personal praise commentary” aesthetic.
title: Image Annotation and Praise Commentary Prompt
description: A detailed prompt for Higgsfield Nano Banana Pro that automatically analyzes an uploaded image of a woman and adds spontaneous, expressive, and positive handwritten Japanese comments, doodles, and editorial markings directly onto the image, creating a visually intense, personalized scrapbook aesthetic.

content:
Create a hyper-realistic portrait of a cute woman using my reference image. She is sitting with her chin resting on her hand at a dark wooden table in front of a vintage-style café.

Fashion & Outfit:
She wears a shiny black leather jacket, slightly open to reveal a white inner top, showing a beautiful neckline. Matched with a fitted black mini-skirt set. She also wears black fishnet stockings. Add a fluffy fur hat over her outfit.

Background:
In front of a marble-grey café exterior, decorated with a Christmas theme. Include a realistic Christmas tree, pine decorations, and festive ornaments.

Lighting & Tone:
Warm orange tungsten lighting for an inviting, cozy atmosphere, combined with a strong direct flash hitting the subject straight on, making her skin bright and glowing, contrasting with the slightly darker background.
The photo should feel Y2K digital compact-camera style—sharp 8K resolution, realistic skin texture, with light film grain.

Hair & Makeup:
Long dark-brown hair blowing slightly in the wind, messy layered strands with a few pieces softly covering part of her face—stylish, cool, and subtly sexy.
Her skin is very fair.
Makeup style: Douyin/Korean—long curled lashes, soft flushed pink blush on cheeks and nose tip, glossy pink lips.
She has Christmas-themed nail art.

Props:
On the table:
• A large bouquet wrapped in brown kraft paper, containing cotton flowers and pine leaves.
• A gold Canon IXY 30S camera placed on the table.

She holds a Christmas-decorated drink in her right hand and smiles slightly.

Additional Visual Style:
The flash creates extremely bright, slightly yellow-tinted skin with a hard shadow behind her.
High-contrast, ultra-sharp 8K image.
Warm ambient sunlight.
Fuji Film Pro 400H color style with old-lens filter and light film grain.
The subject should appear bright and stand out clearly from the background.

content:
Create a realistic high-quality winter family photo using the reference faces without changes. 

Scene 

• Snowy winter day in a park or forest with blurred snow-covered trees (bokeh).

• Neutral palette: beige, cream, white, brown. Bright orange tangerine in mother’s hand as the only accent. 

Mother (Left) 

• Young woman with long wavy hair, smiling at the camera. 

• Brown/taupe faux fur trapper or aviator hat. 

• Matching brown/beige winter coat with faux fur trim. 

• Holding a bright orange tangerine. 

Child (Right, on her lap) 

• About 1 year old, joyful wide smile. 

• White/cream puffy quilted snowsuit. 

• Beige/cream knitted hat with a pom-pom. 

• Light mittens and animal-themed booties (e.g., bear paws). 

Composition & Style 

• Shallow depth of field, strong background blur. 

• Mother sits or half-squats, holding the child closely. 

• Medium shot, centered subjects. 

• Cinematic, hyperrealistic, high resolution, professional post-processing. 

• Cozy hygge winter mood.

content:
<role>
You are specialized in computational photography, specifically the optical characteristics of the {argument name="phone model" default="iPhone 16/17 Pro Max"} sensor system. You translate human concepts into mathematically precise image generation prompts.
</role>

<cognitive_framework>
<principle name="Context Hunger">
If the user provides a vague concept (for example, "{argument name="example vague concept" default="girl at a cafe"}"), you must explicitly invent the missing environmental, lighting, and styling details to ensure a complete image.
</principle>
<principle name="The iPhone Aesthetic">
All outputs must strictly simulate high-end mobile photography.
- Focal Lengths: {argument name="main focal length" default="24mm"} (Main), {argument name="ultra wide focal length" default="13mm"} (Ultra Wide), or {argument name="telephoto focal length" default="77mm"} (Telephoto).
- Characteristics: "Apple ProRAW" color science, sharp details (Deep Fusion), computational bokeh (Portrait Mode), and Smart HDR dynamic range.
- Avoid: anamorphic lens flares, exaggerated "cinema" bokeh, or vintage film grain (unless specified as a filter).
</principle>
<principle name="Imperfection is Realism">
To achieve "ultra-realism," you must inject terms describing unpolished reality: digital noise (not film grain), skin texture, slightly blown-out highlights (common in mobile), and natural "snapshot" framing.
</principle>
<principle name="JSON Precision">
Your output is a strict JSON object designed for programmatic use.
</principle>
</cognitive_framework>

<visual_analysis_reference>
The "Influencer Aesthetic" is defined by:
- Vibe: "Plandid" (planned candid), effortlessness, aspirational lifestyle.
- Lighting: natural window light, golden hour, or "flash photography" (hard flash) for night shots.
- Framing: vertical (9:16) native mobile aspect ratio, often selfies or point-of-view (POV).
</visual_analysis_reference>

<instructions>
1. Analyze the user's request for subject and mood.
2. Enrich the request using "iPhone Photography" constraints.
3. Format the output strictly as a JSON object with the following schema.
</instructions>

  },

content:
A powerful, high-contrast black-and-white side-profile portrait of a person (attached photo), with distinctly human yet timeless features — emerging from complete darkness. The composition is minimalist and sculptural, where form, light, and shadow define the subject rather than color or texture.
The subject’s profile is clean and strong, contemplative expression, as if caught between thought and transcendence. They wear a dark, form-fitting turtleneck sweater that merges seamlessly into the black void, erasing all detail except for the glowing edge of their silhouette.

A single, narrow rim light, bright, sharp, and directional, carves out the shape of the head, neck, and shoulder, tracing the contours with precision. The light originates from directly behind and slightly above the subject, creating a thin, luminous halo along the jawline and the curve of the skull, while the rest dissolves into pure black.

The background is absolute darkness, a void without texture or depth, emphasizing the luminous boundary between shadow and light. There are no midtones, only the purest black and a deliberate contrast with the brightest whites that heightens drama and abstraction.

Mood & Aesthetic: Minimalist, conceptual, and deeply introspective. The image evokes solitude, contemplation, and timeless elegance. It feels cinematic yet intimate, an exploration of identity through light.

Technical details:

Shot with a telephoto lens for compressed perspective.

Aperture wide open (f/1.8-2.8) to create a glowing contour with shallow depth of field.

Optical realism: rendered with ultra-realistic 8K cinematic quality, incorporating true lens physics, depth of field, and subtle film grain, front face good lighting. (Use my picture for reference)

Inspired by @ShreyaYadav___
